# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth every penny of its $80 price tag. Considering its immense worth, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at the same price. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the superior quality and benefits this product has to offer. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $80. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $80
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
